type: Tutorial Step - Your Keys, Your Coins!

definition.text: This is where you configure your Exchange Account Key for the Lightning Strike Live Trading Session.

paragraphs.text: Open the configuration and carefully enter the API name or label and the API secret key.
Delete the default text string for each parameter first, so that no foreign character gets mixed up with the keys.
In the future, when you get to run multiple live sessions at the same time, you will need to set up one Exchange Account Key per session. This is a requirement in most exchanges.
